bibl.title: Another letter from Antonius Longus to his mother Nilous
bibl.note: Edition of a papyrus that was excavated at Karanis in 2010 by the joint expedition of the University of California, Los Angeles, the Rijksuniversiteit Groningen, and the University of Auckland (URU) Fayum Project. The text (second century CE) was written by the same author as B.G.U. III, 846
bibl.seg: 141.4 P. Karanis Inv. FY10-18718-da 145.4 B.G.U. III, 846
Lincoln H. Blumell, Emily Cole & Willeke Wendrich, Another Letter from Antonius Longus to his Mother Nilous.

Edition of a papyrus that was excavated at Karanis in 2010 by the joint expedition of the University of California, Los Angeles, the Rijksuniversiteit Groningen, and the University of Auckland (URU) Fayum Project. The text (second century CE) was written by the same author as B.G.U. III, 846.
bibl.note: Edition of a papyrus that was excavated at Karanis in 2010 by the joint expedition of the University of California, Los Angeles, the Rijksuniversiteit Groningen, and the University of Auckland (URU) Fayum Project. The text (second century CE) was written by the same author as B.G.U. III, 846.
